casebody.data:
Josephine Volpe v. Carmine Volpe (10929)

O’Connell, Foti and Heiman, Js.

Argued December 7 decision released December 29, 1992 Helen C. Brum, with whom, on the brief, was Paul J. Pacifico, for the appellant (plaintiff). Joy Kony Peshkin, with whom, on the brief, was Mitchell A. Dinkin, law student intern, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
